body.p: An entity shall disclose information that enables users of its financial statements to evaluate:

li.p: the nature, extent and financial effects of its interests in joint arrangements and associates, including the nature and effects of its contractual relationship with the other investors with joint control of, or significant influence over, joint arrangements and associates (paragraphs 21 and 22); and
the nature of, and changes in, the risks associated with its interests in joint ventures and associates (paragraph 23).
